item.description: Living in a world where pollution is rampant and we have been disenchanted by the medical system, many of us are returning back to our "roots," literally - and finding that Nature had solutions to all our ailments and health problems all along! Plants can heal! Join Eden for this discussion about the herbs she cannot live without, and how to incorporate them into incredible & tasty herbal elixirs! Come learn & taste how amazingly nourishing and delicious these sacred herbs are, and how to welcome them into your healing journey. 6:30pm $15
item.name: Nourishing Herbs and Super Herbal Elixirs
